dependencies.description:
A platform-independent file lock for Python. This package contains a
single module, which implements a platform independent file lock in
Python, which provides a simple way of inter-process communication
dependencies.name: py-filelock

dependencies.description:
The lockfile package exports a LockFile class which provides a simple
API for locking files. Unlike the Windows msvcrt.locking function, the
fcntl.lockf and flock functions, and the deprecated posixfile module,
the API is identical across both Unix (including Linux and Mac) and
Windows platforms. The lock mechanism relies on the atomic nature of the
link (on Unix) and mkdir (on Windows) system calls. An implementation
based on SQLite is also provided, more as a demonstration of the
possibilities it provides than as production-quality code.
dependencies.name: py-lockfile

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: The Python interface to the Redis key-value store.
dependencies.name: py-redis

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

description:
CacheControl is a port of the caching algorithms in httplib2 for use
with requests session object.
